AAK.caption: Display mode
AAK.doc: Select how to display the livechat when clicking on the small icon. (Livechat = Chat appear bottom right. Popup = Will open a popup windows in the middle of the screen.)
AAK.name: mode

AAL.caption: Improve SEO
AAL.doc: The bot will not load until the user's cursor moves (desktop) or the screen is touched (mobile) [Does nothing when mode is Embed]
AAL.name: improve_seo

AAV.caption: Override Bot URL
AAV.doc: (Optional) Enter the bot URL to use if different than the one of the plugin page.
AAV.name: override_bot_url
